attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So much fuss about the Cutty Sark, what about saving THE CARRICK in better shape than the (sadly) burnt out Cutty Sark. Or is it because it is in London not Glasgow.

Come on Tony do something worthwhile before you depart.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
